text: Ara tara allah‌ chara emana kichura ‘ibadata karache ya tadera ksati'o karate pare na, upakara'o karate pare na. Ara tara bale, ‘egulo allah‌ra kache amadera suparisakari.‘Baluna, ‘tomara ki allah‌ke asamanasamuha o yaminera emana kichura sambada debe ya tini janena na [1]? Tini mahana, ‘pabitra ebam tara yake sarika kare ta theke tini aneka urdhe
